description: The title of the website. This will be displayed in the site header and footer.
Site's logo, the logo file should be provided at 2x resolution and supports any image dimensions.

The logo file should be provided at 2x resolution and supports any image dimensions. This should have an inverted/contrasting colour scheme to logo. If set, this logo will be shown when users toggle from the defaultAppearance mode.
The website description. This will be used in the site metadata.
A Markdown string containing the copyright message to be displayed in the site footer.
The language name as it appears on the language switcher (e.g., EN, FR).
The ISO language code for HTML lang attributes.
Whether to use right-to-left layout for this language (true or false).
The format string used to display dates (e.g., '2 January 2006').
The author's name. This will be displayed in article footers, and on the homepage when the profile layout is used.
The author's email address. Used for email links and reply by email feature.
Image file of the author. The image should be a 1:1 aspect ratio.
The quality of the author image (1-100). Default is 96.
A Markdown string containing the author's headline. It will be displayed on the profile homepage under the author's name.
A Markdown string containing the author's bio. It will be displayed in article footers.

The links to display alongside the author's details. The config file contains example links which can simply be uncommented to enable. The order that the links are displayed is determined by the order they appear in the array.

The theme colour scheme to use. Valid values are blowfish (default), avocado, fire, forest, princess, neon, bloody, terminal, marvel, noir, autumn, congo, slate. Custom themes are supported check Blowfish documentation.
The default theme appearance, either light or dark
'Whether the theme appearance automatically switches based upon the visitor's operating system preference. Set to false to force the site to always use the defaultAppearance.
Enable accessibility toggle for visual accessibility features (true or false).
Whether site search is enabled (true or false).
Whether copy-to-clipboard buttons are enabled for <code> blocks. (true or false).
Enable structured data breadcrumbs for SEO (true or false).
Enable custom styled scrollbar (true or false). Default is true.
Show a reply by email link in articles (true or false).
Default background image for both background homepage layout and background hero style.
Default background image for all featured images across articles, will be overridden by a local featured image.
Default image for social sharing when no featured image is available.

text: Enable/Disable highlighting of the current menu area
description: Marks menu entries in the main menu when selected.
Activate smart Table of Contents, items in view will be highlighted.

text: Enable/Disable smart table of contents hiding content
description: When smart Table of Contents is turned on, this will hide deeper levels of the table when they are not in focus.
Disable the image zoom functionality on click (true or false).
Disable Hugo's image processing and optimization (true or false).
Disable image optimization specifically for markdown content (true or false).
Hide site title text in header, showing only the logo (true or false).
The width in pixels for background images. Default is 1200.
Allow external URLs for feature images instead of local files (true or false).
CSS object-position value for images (e.g., 'center', 'top').
Enable display of article view counts globally (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.
Enable display of article likes globally (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.
Custom robots meta directive for search engines.
Hash algorithm for CSS/JS cache busting. Default is sha512.
Default Gitea server URL for the Gitea shortcode.
Default Forgejo server URL for the Forgejo shortcode.
Defines the header for the entire site, supported values are basic, fixed, fixed-fill, and fixed-fill-blur.
Show/hide the footer menu, which can be configured in the [[footer]] section of the config/_default/menus.en.toml file.
Whether or not to show the copyright string in the site footer. Note that the string itself can be customised using the copyright parameter in the languages configuration.

Whether or not to show the "powered by" theme attribution in the site footer. If you choose to disable this message, please consider attributing the theme somewhere else on your site (for example, on your about page).
Whether or not to show the appearance switcher in the site footer. The browser's local storage is used to persist the visitor's preference.

text: Show/hide scroll to top arrow in footer
description: When set to true the scroll to top arrow is displayed.

The layout of the homepage. Valid values are page, profile, hero, card, background, or custom. When set to custom, you must provide your own layout by creating a /layouts/partials/home/custom.html file.
Image to be used in hero and card layouts.
Whether or not to display the recent articles list on the homepage.
How many articles to display if showRecent is true. If variable is set to 0 or if it isn't defined the system will default to 5 articles.
Whether or not to display a show more link at the end of your posts that takes the user to a predefined place.
The destination of the show more button.

text: Enable/Disable card view for recent articles
description: Display recent articles as a gallery of cards.

text: Enable full width for card view in recent articles
description: Enhance the width of the recent articles card gallery to take the full width available.

text: Enable/Disable blur effect for background image
description: Makes the background image in the homepage layout blur with the scroll
Remove the filter overlay from hero images on the homepage (true or false).
Whether or not article dates are displayed.
Display view count on articles (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.
Display like count on articles (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.

text: Show date only in article body
description: Show the date only within the article body, not in listings (true or false).
Display the last updated date on articles (true or false).
Whether or not the author box is displayed in the article footer.

text: Show author at bottom of article
description: Display the author box at the bottom of the article instead of the top (true or false).
Whether the thumbnail image will be shown as a hero image within each article page.

text: Select style for hero images in articles
description: Style to display the hero image, valid options are: basic, big, background, thumbAndBackground.

text: Blur the background in articles with scroll
description: Makes the background image in the background article heroStyle blur with the scroll

text: Add space between the header and the body in articles
description: Add space between the header and the body.
Whether or not breadcrumbs are displayed in the article header.
Whether or not the draft indicator is shown next to articles when site is built with --buildDrafts
Display an edit link on articles (true or false).
The base URL for the edit link (e.g., GitHub edit URL).
Automatically append the article path to the edit URL (true or false).
Whether the series module is expanded by default (true or false).
Display anchor links on headings (true or false).

text: Show/Hide prev and next article in each article page
description: Whether or not the next/previous article links are displayed in the article footer.

text: Invert prev and next order in each article page
description: Whether or not to flip the direction of the next/previous article links.

text: Show/Hide reading time in each article page
description: Whether or not article reading times are displayed.

text: Show/Hide table of contents in articles
description: Whether or not the table of contents is displayed on articles.

Display related content for each post. Might required additional configuration to your hugo.toml. Please check the theme hugo.toml if you want to enable this feature and copy all the relevant related entries. Also check Hugo's docs on related content.

text: Number of related items to show in articles
description: Limit of related articles to display if showRelatedContent is turned on.
Whether or not the taxonomies related to this article are displayed.
Show only the category taxonomy instead of all taxonomies (true or false).

Whether the authors taxonomies are are displayed in the article or list header. This requires the setup of multiple authors and the authors taxonomy. Check this page for more details on how to configure that feature.
Whether or not article word counts are displayed.
Enable comments section on articles (true or false). Requires a comments provider setup.
Flag to activate Zen Mode reading feature for articles.

text: Force external links to open in new tab
description: Force external links in articles to open in a new tab (true or false).
Whether the thumbnail image will be shown as a hero image within each list page.
Style to display the hero image, valid options are: basic, big, background, thumbAndBackground.
Whether or not breadcrumbs are displayed in the header on list pages.

text: Blur background image in lists with scroll
description: Makes the background image in the background list heroStyle blur with the scroll

text: Add space between the header and the body in lists
description: Add space between the header and the body.

text: Show/Hide table of contents in lists
description: Whether or not the table of contents is displayed on list pages.
Whether or not article summaries are displayed on list pages. If a summary is not provided in the front matter, one will be auto generated using the summaryLength parameter in the site configuration.
Display view count on list pages (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.
Display like count on list pages (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.

text: Display articles as cards in lists
description: Whether or not each article is displayed as a card or as simple inline text.
Sort list items by weight instead of date (true or false).

text: Group content by year in lists
description: Whether or not articles are grouped by year on list pages.

text: Enable/Disable card view for articles in lists
description: Display lists as a gallery of cards.

text: Enable/disable full width for card view in lists
description: Enhance the width of card galleries in lists to take the full width available.

text: Enable/disable constrainting item width to prose size in lists
description: Limit item width to prose to increase readability. Useful when no feature images are available.

text: Show/hide number of items on the taxonomy listing
description: Whether or not the number of articles within a taxonomy term is displayed on the taxonomy listing.

text: Show/hide hero image in taxonomy pages
description: Whether the thumbnail image will be shown as a hero image within each taxonomy page.

text: Select hero style in taxonomy pages
description: Style to display the hero image, valid options are: basic, big, background, thumbAndBackground.
Whether or not breadcrumbs are displayed in the taxonomy header.
Display view count on taxonomy pages (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.
Display like count on taxonomy pages (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.

text: Show/Hide table of contents in taxonomy pages
description: Whether or not the table of contents is displayed on taxonomies.

text: Enable/Disable card view for taxonomy pages
description: Display lists as a gallery of cards.
Whether the thumbnail image will be shown as a hero image within each term page.
Style to display the hero image, valid options are: basic, big, background, thumbAndBackground.
Whether or not breadcrumbs are displayed in the term header.
Display view count on term pages (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.
Display like count on term pages (true or false). Requires Firebase setup.

text: Show/Hide table of contents in terms
description: Whether or not the table of contents is displayed on terms.

text: Group content by year in terms
description: Whether or not articles are grouped by year on term pages.
Display lists as a gallery of cards.

text: Enable full width for card view in terms
description: Enhance the width of card galleries in lists to take the full width available.
Firebase API key for views/likes functionality.
Firebase authentication domain.
Firebase project ID.
Firebase storage bucket URL.
Firebase messaging sender ID.
Firebase app ID.
Firebase measurement ID for analytics.
Fathom Analytics site code for tracking.
Fathom Analytics custom domain (optional).
Umami Analytics website ID for tracking.
Umami Analytics custom domain.
Umami Analytics tracked domains (comma-separated).
Umami Analytics script filename. Default is 'script.js'.
Enable Umami event tracking (true or false).
Seline Analytics token for tracking.
Enable Seline event tracking (true or false).
Your Buy Me a Coffee account identifier.

text: Buy Me a Coffee Global Widget
description: Enable global Buy Me a Coffee widget (true or false).

text: Buy Me a Coffee Widget Message
description: Custom message for the Buy Me a Coffee widget.

text: Buy Me a Coffee Widget Color
description: Color for the Buy Me a Coffee widget (hex format, e.g., #FFDD00).

text: Buy Me a Coffee Widget Position
description: Position of the Buy Me a Coffee widget.
Google Search Console verification string.
Bing Webmaster Tools verification string.
Pinterest verification string.
Yandex Webmaster verification string.
Fediverse handle for verification (e.g., @user@mastodon.social).
RSSNext feed ID for feed following.
RSSNext user ID.
Google AdSense publisher ID for displaying ads.

text: baseURL - The URL to the root of the website.
description: The URL to the root of the website.

text: enableEmoji - (boolean) Enables or disables emoji support within articles.
description: (boolean) Enables or disables emoji support within articles.
The Google Analytics tracking ID to use. Supports v3 and v4.
